<h3 id="X38083">X(38083) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(5), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4+3*(b+c)*a^3-2*(5*b^2+3*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+8*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38083) = X(1)-7*X(15703) = 5*X(2)+X(355) = 13*X(2)-X(944) = 4*X(2)-X(1385) = 7*X(2)-X(3655) = 7*X(2)+5*X(5818) = X(2)+2*X(9956) = 11*X(2)+X(34627) = 3*X(2)+X(38074) = 13*X(355)+5*X(944) = 4*X(355)+5*X(1385) = 3*X(355)+5*X(3653) = 7*X(355)+5*X(3655) = X(355)-10*X(9956) = 11*X(355)-5*X(34627) = 3*X(355)-5*X(38074) = 4*X(944)-13*X(1385) = 3*X(944)-13*X(3653) = 7*X(944)-13*X(3655) = 11*X(944)+13*X(34627) = 3*X(944)+13*X(38074)</b>
<p>X(38083) lies on these lines: {1,15703}, {2,355}, {3,19876}, {5,3828}, {10,547}, {30,10164}, {40,19709}, {165,14269}, {376,19877}, {381,1698}, {515,11539}, {516,38071}, {517,4731}, {519,10172}, {524,38167}, {527,38172}, {528,38182}, {529,38183}, {546,31447}, {549,3634}, {551,3628}, {553,10592}, {758,38085}, {946,10109}, {952,19883}, {1656,3679}, {2802,38084}, {3090,3656}, {3241,5067}, {3524,28160}, {3526,31666}, {3534,31423}, {3545,9812}, {3564,38089}, {3584,17606}, {3654,5071}, {3830,7989}, {3839,28146}, {3844,5476}, {3845,6684}, {4297,11812}, {4301,12812}, {4413,28444}, {4669,5901}, {4677,33179}, {4870,18395}, {5054,5587}, {5066,22793}, {5070,15178}, {5072,9588}, {5076,31425}, {5493,12811}, {5550,32900}, {5691,15693}, {5762,38101}, {5790,25055}, {5843,38094}, {5844,38098}, {5847,38079}, {5850,38080}, {6175,22936}, {8227,34718}, {8703,19925}, {10124,18357}, {10171,38112}, {10225,17532}, {11362,35018}, {11499,17542}, {11648,31430}, {12100,34648}, {12101,34638}, {12512,33699}, {12702,30308}, {13624,15694}, {14892,28174}, {14893,22266}, {15681,18492}, {15684,35242}, {15685,16192}, {15688,28168}, {15701,34628}, {15702,18481}, {15723,18525}, {16417,23961}, {16418,33862}, {16857,32613}, {19878,37705}, {26086,28453}, {31253,34773}, {31673,34200}</p>
<p>
X(38083) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {165, 14269}, {3545, 26446}, {3653, 38074}, {5054, 5587}, {5055, 19875}, {5790, 25055}, {15699, 38042}, {38021, 38066}, {38022, 38081}, {38068, 38076}<br>
X(38083) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (11230, 15699), (15699, 10172), (17502, 5054)<br>
X(38083) = complement of X(3653)<br>
X(38083) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 5818, 3655), (2, 38074, 3653), (3654, 5071, 9955), (5055, 38066, 38021), (5071, 9780, 3654), (10172, 38042, 11230), (10175, 11231, 38140), (10175, 38068, 38076), (11230, 38042, 38176), (15699, 38081, 38022), (19875, 38021, 38066), (38022, 38042, 38081), (38104, 38105, 19883)<br>
</p>
